head.title: Cedar Shake Roofing | Natural Beauty & Durability | RMR Construction & Remodeling
head.description: Discover the timeless beauty and durability of cedar shake roofing with RMR Construction & Remodeling. Offering eco-friendly solutions, expert installation, and tailored designs for homes in Sacramento, Placer, and El Dorado counties.
head.keywords: cedar shake roofing, cedar shingles, cedar roof installation, eco-friendly roofing, natural wood roofing, cedar roof repair, durable roofing solutions, RMR Construction & Remodeling, cedar roofing Sacramento, cedar roofing Placer County, cedar shake maintenance, custom cedar roofs, energy-efficient roofing, sustainable roofing materials
